jrmds.controller

Class ProjectController

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrmds.controller.ProjectController

  • @Controller
public class ProjectController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all methods and REST calls for projects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      An instance of the XmlLogic class to handle usage of xml

      List of the Names of all existing projects.

      An instance of the UserManagement class to handle users

      An instance of the ViewController class to handle the users.

                method=GET)
public java.lang.String createNewProject(@CurrentUser
                                                                                                                  RegistredUser regUser,
                                                                                                                  org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        REST call to get the html document createNewProject.
        Parameters:
        model -
        regUser - The user status.
        Returns:
        createNewProject The html document to create a new Project.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the user has no right to do this.

      • addNewProject

        @RequestMapping(value="/addNewProject",
                method={GET,POST})
public java.lang.String addNewProject(@CurrentUser
                                                                                                                   RegistredUser regUser,
                                                                                                                   org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                   java.lang.String pName,
                                                                                                                   java.lang.String pDescription)
        Rest call to add the project to the database.
        Parameters:
        regUser - The user status.
        model -
        pName - name of the project.
        pDescription - description of the project.
        Returns:
        redirect:projects Redirects to the html document with the list of all projects.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if a project with pname already exists or the user has no right to do this.

        model -
        Returns:
        projectOverview The html document which shows all project properties and functions depending on user status.

 @ResponseBody

                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String desiredProjectName)

        Parameters:
        desiredProjectName -
        regUser - The user status.
        Returns:

      • showProperties

        @RequestMapping(value="/projectProps",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String showProperties(@RequestParam(required=true)
                                                                                                            java.lang.String project,
                                                                                                            @RequestParam(defaultValue="")
                                                                                                            java.lang.String delUser,
                                                                                                            @CurrentUser
                                                                                                            RegistredUser regUser,
                                                                                                            org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Rest call to get an overview of the properties of a project.
        Parameters:
        project - name of the project.
        delUser - deletion of an user.
        regUser - The user status.
        model -
        Returns:
        projectProps or guestprojectProps html document showing the properties of the project. If user is logged in, with functions to edit.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the project doesn't exist.

      • saveProps

        @RequestMapping(value="/saveProps",
                method={GET,POST})
public java.lang.String saveProps(@RequestParam(required=true)
                                                                                                           java.lang.String project,
                                                                                                           @RequestParam
                                                                                                           java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                           @RequestParam
                                                                                                           java.lang.String description,
                                                                                                           org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                           @CurrentUser
                                                                                                           RegistredUser regUser)

        Parameters:
        project - The name of the current project.
        name - The new name for the project.
        description - The new description for the project.
        model -
        regUser - The user status.
        Returns:
        confirmation The html document to confirm the successful change.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the project doesn't exist or the user has no right to do this.

      • depthSearch

        public void depthSearch(Component nr,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> visit)
        DepthSearch to find cycles in the references.
        Parameters:
        nr - The current Component which references are to check.
        visit - The Map of already visited Components.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if a cycle is found.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if nr is null.

      • addExternalRepos

        @RequestMapping(value="/addExternalRepos",
                method={POST,GET})
public java.lang.String addExternalRepos(@RequestParam(required=true)
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String project,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String externalRepo,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(defaultValue="PROJECT")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String type,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(defaultValue="")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String RefID,
                                                                                                                         @CurrentUser
                                                                                                                         RegistredUser regUser,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                                                                         java.lang.Boolean add,
                                                                                                                         org.springframework.ui.Model model)
                                                                                                                  throws java.io.InvalidObjectException,
                                                                                                                         java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                                                                                                         XmlParseException
        Rest call to add an external Repository to a project or checks for intersections.
        Parameters:
        project - The name of the current project.
        externalRepo - The external Repository which is to be added.
        type - To check if a repository is to be added to a group or to a project.
        RefID - The RefID of the group, if type=GROUP.
        regUser - The user status.
        add - To check, if a new external Repository is to be added, or if the function is used to check for intersections.
        model -
        Returns:
        confirmationIntersection The html document which shows all current intersections and confirms the added Repositories.
        Throws:
        java.io.InvalidObjectException
        java.net.MalformedURLException
        XmlParseException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the project/group doesn't exist or the user has no right to do this.

      • deleteExternalRepos

        @RequestMapping(value="/deleteExternalRepos",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String deleteExternalRepos(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                         @CurrentUser
                                                                                                                         RegistredUser regUser,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String project,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(defaultValue="PROJECT")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String type,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(defaultValue="")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String RefID,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="",value="isString")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String[] isString)
        Rest call to delete an external Repository from the project/group.
        Parameters:
        model -
        regUser - The user status.
        project - The name of the current project.
        type - If the external Repository is to be deleted from a project or from a group.
        RefID - The RefID if it is a group.
        isString -
        Returns:
        confirmation The html document which confirms the deletion of the external Repository.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the project/group doesn't exist or the user has no right to do this.

      • importXml

        @RequestMapping(value="/importXmlFile",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String importXml(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                         @CurrentUser
                                                                                                         RegistredUser regUser,
                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="project")
                                                                                                         java.lang.String projectName,
                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="file")
                                                                                                         org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file,
                                                                                                         @RequestParam(defaultValue="PROJECT")
                                                                                                         java.lang.String type,
                                                                                                         @RequestParam(defaultValue="")
                                                                                                         java.lang.String RefID)
                                                                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Rest call to import a local Xml File into the project.
        Parameters:
        model -
        regUser - The user status.
        project - The name of the current project.
        type - If the external Repository is to be deleted from a project or from a group.
        RefID - The RefID if it is a group.
        isString -
        Returns:
        confirmation The html document which confirms the deletion of the external Repository.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the project/group doesn't exist or the user has no right to do this.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if XML file is empty.
        java.lang.Exception

      • saveImportXml

        @RequestMapping(value="/saveImportXmlFile",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String saveImportXml(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                 @CurrentUser
                                                                                                                 RegistredUser regUser,
                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="project")
                                                                                                                 java.lang.String projectName,
                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(defaultValue="PROJECT")
                                                                                                                 java.lang.String type,
                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(defaultValue="")
                                                                                                                 java.lang.String RefID,
                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(defaultValue="")
                                                                                                                 java.lang.String[] isChecked)
                                                                                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Rest call so save the Components of an XMLFile Import after errors and selection into the project.
        Parameters:
        model -
        request -
        regUser - The user status.
        projectName - Name of the current project.
        type - Type of the target location
        RefID - refID if not project as target location
        isChecked - collection of selected components with errors
        Returns:
        confirmationImport html document to confirm import
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • deleteProject

        @RequestMapping(value="/deleteProject",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String deleteProject(@CurrentUser
                                                                                                             RegistredUser regUser,
                                                                                                             @RequestParam(required=true)
                                                                                                             java.lang.String project)
        Rest Call to delete a project.
        Parameters:
        regUser - The user status.
        project - The name of the current project.
        Returns:
        redirect:projects A redirection to the html document projects.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the project/group doesn't exist or the user has no right to do this.
